units.title: Aggregate formation
units.text: 2 × 105 cells per mL on 6-well low-attachment plate 50 μM Y27632
units.rationale: Establishes the initial cell density and Y‑27632 to promote aggregate formation.

units.title: Mesoderm induction
units.text: Start mesoderm differentiation induction 12 μM CHIR99021, 30 ng/mL BMP-4
units.rationale: Activates WNT and BMP pathways to drive hPSCs toward mesoderm.

units.title: Vascular lineage induction
units.text: Start vascular differentiation induction 100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 2 μM forskolin
units.rationale: Induces endothelial and pericyte fate from mesodermal progenitors.

units.title: Embedding of cell aggregates
units.text: Vessel sprouting d5 into collagen I–Matrigel matrix (12-well plate) 100 ng/mL VEGF-A, 100 ng/mL FGF-2, 15% FBS
units.rationale: Provides a 3D matrix and growth factors for vascular network formation.

units.title: Extract blood vessel networks
units.text: vessel organoid self-assembly (12-well plate) ~20 min for 1 well (~50–60 organoids)
units.rationale: Isolates individual organoids for downstream analysis or transplantation.

units.title: Wash hPSCs with EDTA
units.text: 1 Wash hPSCs with 0.5 mM EDTA by removing E8 medium and replacing it with 0.6 mL of 0.5 mM EDTA per well of a 6-well plate.
units.rationale: Gentle dissociation prepares cells for aggregation.

units.title: Resuspend cells in aggregation medium
units.text: 9 Resuspend the cells in 5 mL of aggregation medium using a 5-mL serological pipette and collect the cells in a 15-mL Falcon tube.
units.rationale: Creates a uniform suspension for consistent aggregate size.

units.title: Mesoderm differentiation incubation
units.text: 13 Use a 10-mL serological pipette to gently resuspend the aggregates (3 mL per well) in N2B27 medium + 12 µM CHIR99021 + 30 ng/mL BMP-4 and transfer the aggregates back to the low-attachment plate. Incubate the cells.
units.rationale: Allows mesodermal patterning while maintaining aggregate integrity.

units.title: Add prewarmed medium for blood vessel differentiation
units.text: 35 Add prewarmed (37 °C) StemPro-34 SFM complete medium including 15% FBS, 100 ng/mL VEGF-A and 100 ng/mL FGF-2 to induce blood vessel differentiation.
units.rationale: Supplies nutrients and growth factors to promote sprouting vessels.

units.title: Fix vascular networks with PFA
units.text: (i) Carefully aspirate the medium from a well using a P1000 pipette and add 4% paraformaldehyde (PFA) solution in PBS for 20 min at room temperature.
units.rationale: Preserves network morphology for subsequent staining and imaging.
